attacks.name: Wake-Up Slap
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 60 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dynamic Punch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage and your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
